name: zot-registry
tagline: A self-hosted OCI image registry focused on simplicity, security, and cloud-native workflows
description: zot is a self-hosted OCI image registry focused on simplicity, security, and cloud-native workflows. It supports replication, access control, and a minimal web UI and APIs for managing container images.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Synchronize images between registries for disaster recovery and geographic distribution

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Define granular permissions for repositories with support for authentication and authorization

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Browse repositories, tags, and image details through a minimal web UI for quick inspection

features.title: REST API
features.description: Work with Docker CLI, Podman, and other OCI-compliant tools without modifications
